title: Suzume No Tojimari
description: A touching novel adaptation of Makoto Shinkai’s film, following Suzume’s journey to close mysterious doors that unleash disasters across Japan.
author: Makoto Shinkai

title: How To Think Like Einstein
description: A guide to developing creative thinking and problem-solving skills inspired by Albert Einstein’s unique approach to science and life.
author: Scott Thorpe

title: Only Murder
description: A chilling thriller about a detective trapped in a small town where every clue points back to his own past.
author: Lisa Matthews

title: The Love Hypothesis
description: A rom-com novel about a young scientist navigating fake dating and unexpected love in academia.
author: Ali Hazelwood

title: It's a Funny Thing
description: A light-hearted exploration of humor and human nature through witty stories and real-life anecdotes.
author: James Corbin

title: The Nature Of Technology
description: An insightful analysis of how technology evolves and shapes society, exploring the logic behind invention and innovation.
author: W. Brian Arthur

title: Tomorrow Most Likely
description: A delightful children’s book that imagines all the wonderful things tomorrow might bring, encouraging curiosity and imagination.
author: Dave Eggers

title: Fundamentals Of Business
description: A comprehensive introduction to modern business concepts, including management, marketing, finance, and entrepreneurship.
author: Stephen J. Skripak
